review: I'll start off by saying all the hype that the Chromecast got when it launched, was all well deserved. This is my third Chromecast, and I have even started thinking of buying a fourth so that I can have one on every television set in my house.To start off, I tried the device using my iPhone and began streaming Netflix and YouTube with zero problems. They came through in amazing quality, and actually allowed me to disconnect and sell my XBOX that I previously used for streaming.Best part is, the Chromecast is so much smaller then any other device so I'm able to save a lot of room to store other items!After seeing how well my phone worked, I tried my laptop. I have a Macbook, and the YouTube and Netflix streams were once again flawless.I was also able to stream any tab I had open in Google Chrome to my screen. This feature was surprisingly cool, and allowed me to easily put up my Google Slide Shows on a television during business meetings. It also allowed for easy switching between mine and my co-workers presentations. My meeting were cut down in time, and I feel as if we accomplished more during the time as well.All in all, the Chromecast has become a huge part of my life! I would high recommend everyone who doesn't have one to order one now! Who knows, maybe you'll end up buying multiple just as I did!
